content.detailedDescription:
My fiancee rented a cabin in christopher creek for my birthday. after having dinner and a few drinks, the restaurant closed about 10:00 p.M., so we went back to the cabin. after she went to bed, i went out to take pictures of the full moon with a digital camera my friend lent me.

the full moon was to the west of us and i focused on two objects under the moon when i took the picture. later, i took another picture of the moon when it looked more brilliant (complete picture not included for privacy reasons, which i will explain).

still later that night, probably 1:00 a.M. on the 29th, i was on the back porch facing east, when i noticed a light just above the trees. i hustled back into the cabin and grabbed the digital camera. to my surprise, the light was still there and i took the picture, saying to it, "gotcha!"

i honestly didn't think much about it. i have seen a lot of things in the sky that i can't explain. the one and only time i reported anything to the seattle-based ufo reporting center, it was deemed "jupiter?"

because of that experience, i took the pictures believing they would be nothing of significance.

two weeks later, when i was putting together a video of the trip, i zoomed in on the objects, and to my surprise, they were not planets/stars. after contemplating whether or not to report it, i sent two of the photos to "coast to coast" on june 29. i have yet to hear back from them.

last night (july 7), the friend who lent me the camera came by to visit. i have since given him his camera back and he asked me about one of the pictures. he asked "why did you put your address on the photo?"

i replied with, "what? i would never put my address on a picture. i don't want people knowing where i live."

he said, "well it is on the window of the trailer under the full moon. you sure you didn't put it there?"

after discussing the weirdness of the picture, he went home and i went to bed. i kept thinking about what he said, so i got up and went to take a look for myself. chills ran up and down my body for a full 30 seconds when i confirmed what my friend had told me - my address was indeed on the photograph. how? there is no address even close to mine in christopher creek!

i should point out that i own a home that is zoned for three structures. and while we had confusion with the city of phoenix over the true address of our home, the address in the photograph is part of our property.

two pictures actually have the same reddish area on the trailer which was part of the cabin owner's property, and located just east of our cabin rental. while the picture i am attaching has that area naturally blurred because i was focusing on the two objects under the full moon, the part of the picture i am not attaching has my street address clearly written in box-lettering, much like those letters you buy for your mailbox, except in a glowing reddish color. it looks like this: 

"000 n 00rd st" - i am a little freaked out...


i have sent the third picture cropped without my address to show you the location of the full moon.

note to mufon: i will gladly share the picture with my address clearly written with stipulations. you can confirm the address, but i don't want the world to know my address - fair enough?
content.summary: Objects in front and back of a rented cabin

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my two buddies making a donation to the wilderness urination station at about 10:30 p.M., we were admireing how well you could see the stars that night when i saw what looked to be a satilite moving through the night sky, then i realiezed...Satillites dont blink, it was blinking and moving pretty quick. it went to a solid color, continued to make a big arc in the sky, slowed down then dissappeared into the darkness of the night. during it both my buddies and i were trying to think what it was, it was blinking then went to a solid color then dissappeared, we were saying that it was way to high to be a plane and way to fast and eratic to be a satilite. after it dissappeared i was chilled to the bone...I didnt know what to think, did we just see a ufo? well...We did and still to believe it was a ufo.
content.summary: Looked like a fast blinking satillite then it slowed down, made a big arc in the night sky, slowed down, then dissappeared

content.detailedDescription:
My father and i were in our swimming pool, when my dad noticed something flying in the sky.  my dad thought it might have been a bird or a jet airliner. (he didn't have his glasses on) all he noticed was a circle of shaded light with some kind of square lines around it.  once my dad pointed the object out to me, i saw beyond the trees, for about 15 seconds, a triangle about a centimeter long.  my guess was that it was about 4,000 ft. high.  trailing it were 2 black dots about 2x bigger than a period in this font.  the triangle itself was glowing a dark yellow.  the reason we lost sight of it was because it trailed above the trees, out of our sight.  it was silent and moving maybe faster than a jet airliner.  i didn`t care for it at the time, and i continued swimming with my dad. but later the next day (today) my mother convinced me to write this report. /\
       /  \       
      /____\
      .    .                this is how it looked, only the triangle was   
                        shorter and stretched out at the bottem 2 points.
content.summary: Triangle and two lights trailing it at 7:30pm in goshen,  indiana

content.detailedDescription:
I have recorded footage on various days of what i believe is a ufo, in my videos most of the footage has been taken from my bedroom accept for the last footage which was taken from my back garden using a tripod.

also during the period of 19th-24th may 2007 i have experienced seeing flashing lights which have come out of this object in the sky, this was before i just went into my local pub with my mates on the 19th may and have also witnessed as a passenger in car some sort ufo triangle craft elevating in the sky above the 3 objects which were in a triangle formation this was when my mate was driving down the m6 on the motorway on the 24th may.
i have compiled all my recordings into one video. this is not the complete recording, it has been shortened to 10 minutes. please click on the link below to see:
http://video.Google.Co.Uk/videoplay?Docid=2138839065324379175 

i have also seen the objects in this video above the past 2 nights, in different positions and we are now in july. 

would be very interested for feedback please.

looking forward to hearing from you soon
yours faithfully

roberto pall
content.summary: 21-24th may 2007 ufo compilation  of footage on various nights

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting my parents in indiana and i had brought a childhood friend along named "bartel" when we arrived we visited my folks and then later met up with my cousin "richardson" we stayed the night over at his house and as it got later at night we decided to go outside where me and "bartel" were partying not to hard mind you but partying when i noticed what looked like headlights very far off in the distance just above the tree tops i got my friends attention and jokingly talked about the flying car from the movie flubber starring robin williams doubt your firmiliar with it quite a stupid movie but anyway the flying car off in the night sky was creeping very very slowly maybe 10m.P.H. toward us and was making no more than a quiet humming noise we instantly knew this wasn't right nothing man made is as quiet or able to move as slowly as this craft did without falling out of the sky so we got exciteable as we have both seen things before but nothing quite as up close and personal as this anyway the craft kept moving closer until it was just 75 feet (estimate)above us it was shaped like a thin hexagon in relation to it's length maybe 25-30' long and 10-15' wide there were 2 lights on the front of the craft placed basically just like a cars headlights there were small steady red lights an every point of the hexagon except the front my friend "bartel" was going to attempt to shine a flashlight he had at it but i wasn't having anything of the sort (tempting unknown forces)so i smacked the flashlight out of his hand and quietly said no and we both stared slack jawed as the craft slowly flew away from us until it was out of sight it didn't feel real we just stood there for at least 15 minutes more shaking our heads wondering what the hell had just happened like i said earlier we have both seen things before but nothing like this i'm not a conspiracy theorist at all generally they sicken me but it just screamed government but obviously influenced by higher technology. i don't wan't this posted but i would be happy to answer any questions you may have
content.summary: A hexagon shaped craft flew over top of my friend and i

content.detailedDescription: On i-78 west in direction of newark airport from hoboken. i looked towards horizon and i saw the object moving slowly if moving at all. it looked to be about 200-300 feet off the ground. it just sat there and as the highway veared to the right and my wife kept watching until it was out of our view. i fly 75% of the year and this was no airplane. my wife saw as well and what we saw, definately no airplane. it had a quicksilver look to it and had about 5-7 bright lights along the side of it.
content.summary: Silver long, cylinder (100-150 yards long) w/ quicksilver color and 5-7 bright lights evenly spaced along the side.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the parking lot of a mall in the bed of a pickup wating with my camera for a fireworks show that started at 9:30. sometimes i see a light at night i think is a star or satellite, but it looks like it changes shape from my eyes view. i noticed somethiing similar and thought since i had my camera i would take pictures to see if anything happend when i was able to get a closer look. when i first noticed it i thought it could be a star, satellite, or spacestation. the object appeared as a bright light that grew and shortened. my feelings during seeing the object was curiosity and after was wondering what it could be and astounded when viewing the pictures. in the distance behind the object pictures after picture i noticed what could be a star or planet. i used the zoom on the camera and took picture after picture only for a few seconds, but i saw the light for about ten minutes. i lost sight of the object because i took my attention to away, but in a few pictures the object doesn't look bright anymore.
content.shape: Circle,  Cross,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Triangle,  Other
content.summary: Strange light at 4th of july event.

content.detailedDescription: This was early fall 1997 appx.,  my family and i went over to my inlaws which also live in levittown ny.,  for a barbecue appx. 12pm est., there were about 10 adults and 8 preteens gathered in the backyard just playing, talking and milling about. i was talking to my brother in-law and happen to look up behind him and noticed bright cylindrical object in the distance high in the sky, as i kept looking up i saw the object was in the southern sky  and was in a tilted angle, using a clock as a reference of point, the object was at appx. 11 and 4 o'clock position and was stationary,i had pointed it out to everyone,and we all started looking at it. the object seems to have been stationary and as time passed, every hour it was moving away with the horizon, by about 6pm it was pretty much out of sight,i possibly thought it was the space station that i saw, but most articles said that the space staion was not visible to the naked eye, and that week i scoured the papers for any mention of it but saw none, all the people at the barbecue saw it so i assume other people had to have seen it.Only once did i find a small mention of it on the internet, but it didn't say much about it. as to how i felt, it was an exciting moment for me, i always wanted to  know if that was the space staion that i saw and if not well then i can say it was a ufo. my daughter was seven years old at the time and now at 16 still remembers seeing it. i also thought it might have been the hubble telescope, but from the distance that we were viewing it i don't think it would be big enough to see. the object i would guess was appx. 2 to 3 inches in length from where we viewed it.
content.summary: Spotted a stationary long silver cylndrical object.

content.detailedDescription:
I've attached a word file of the nuforc report i submitted.   also please find an animated gif of five photos taken in a 'burst' with my digital slr camera....The five photos were taken in a span of approx. four seconds.


i will be more than happy to answer any additional questions or provide you with the five raw digital photos if you need them.

thank you,
jeff westover
517-529-3174
clarklake, mi
content.summary: Photographed a v-shaped array of objects that appeared to move in a zig zag motion throughout five photographs...

content.detailedDescription: I often stand on my balcony to enjoy the weather and hope to catch glimpses of stars, sight the moon in phases, etc.  i've been  trying out my new camera and trying it on different settings and times of day and night.  this particular night i took a series of pictures and on some i captured some odd images.  this was one. after uploading them i saw many different strange objects on the images, this one was the most startling. i did not notice this object when i took the photograph.
content.summary: Taking pictures from my balcony i uploaded images and this thing appeared

content.detailedDescription:
There was a 4th of july (2007) fireworks display in scott's valley near santa cruz.  about 9:25 p.M. a twinkiling light in odd patterns appeared.  people were lined up on mt. hermon road and began commenting "look at the ufo."  for the next 15 minutes the lights made a circular pattern around the fireworks display, going above it, and making a large circle in the sky.  the lights were all over the place.  my wife began to take pictures and short video clips.  (using a 10x optical zoom).

after the fireworks were over, the lights no longer made a circle and left.  the surprise came when we enlarged the video in the camera and just about freaked out.  it reminded me of the dropa stone.  very strange!  this may be the best picture of a ufo ever taken.

note:  picture #1 is the raw photo; picture #2 is zoomed in.
content.summary: Blinking lights reveal ufo

content.detailedDescription: Me and my dad went to the whisky cafe in north arlington (nj) to see if they still had there car shows.They said yes.So as we leave to go to the car we here a faint whistle like sound,we didnt care about it until we went in the car,leeft the parking lot and saw what was causing that noise from the south west.It was a dark oval objectmoving up and down left to right and hovering.There was smoke coming out the back of it,like it was going to crash it started moveing down then suddenly vanished behind the clouds.This all happened in a..Quick quick 35 seconds!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Oval,dark,smoke coming out the back

content.detailedDescription: I awoke went into the bathroom noticed a bright light through the window some leaves were still on the trees and the light was behind some large trees. i initially thought it was a full moon but as i looked it moved slowly north to south at the same altitude but was smaller and brighter than the moon. it stopped and accelerated straight down at unbelievable speed coming to a dead stop then moving at a right angle a short distance another sudden stop and then moving up extremely fast to  sudden stop at the same altitude were it started from initially. it then moved away steadily at the same height till it disappeared behind some trees on a ridge. the light was approximately 300 feet high when it started these movements. we lived near the airport and this definitely was not an conventional aircraft i assume it would have to be remotely operated as occupants would not be able to withstand the extreme speed or stops of the movements. i just decided it was time to let someone know after all these years i searched the files to see if anyone else saw anything near those dates in north carolina. i've been in the military and work for an airline but i've never seen anything like this before or since.
content.summary: Bright white light circular in shape made some exteme right angle movements involving impossible stops and starts at extreme speed.

content.detailedDescription: The four of us were sitting outside around a fire pit at our friends house facing to the north around 12:30am when i noticed a bright green light entering the horizon to the east.  i noticed the object because it was so bright.  we couldn't make out an actual object, but what made it so noticeable was how bright it was and how fast it was moving.  it crossed the entire skyline in a straight line in about 4 seconds at what seemed like an amazingly fast rate of speed and made no sound at all.  it also had what was like a long white tail that was probably half as long as the entire skyline.  we all stood up to look around because we couldn't believe what we saw.  we lost sight of the object when it left our point of view to the west.  it was a clear sky without the moon having risen yet.  and, it was just very vivid compared to the other objects in the sky that night.  we could see the big dipper perfectly above our heads and planes flying overhead much much higher than this object was.
content.summary: Saw an object cross the skyline in 3 or 4 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I heard a plane and went outside to photograph then i got this when i uploaded it onto pc.
content.summary: Ufo over my house under airplane

content.detailedDescription: While spending the night at my friends house  , we set up our sleeping bags in the back yard,guess it was around 9:00 or so, just remember it was dark outside. i remember i was getting ready to go to sleep so i took my glasses off, and put them next to me by the sleeping bag. i remember that i was just looking up at the sky while laying in my bag and something started to come across the sky right over top of us,since i didnt have my glasses on i cant say how high it was , but i could see it very well so im guessing it was rather close. the first thing it reminded me of was a skate or stingray the way it was shaped ,it was a brownish color with no lights and moving really slow, the thing that made it remind me that it looked like a skate was, the edeges of its wings seemed to be flaping  but as i looked closer  the edeges were fuzzy and out of focus, sort of like waves on the water. i asked my friend whats that right there pointing to the thing, as soon as he saw it he ran into his house, i was busy trying to find my glasses to get a better look , but in my haste couldnt find them, so i just watched it move out of site over top the hedge behind me. my buddy never did come back out of the house,the only thing i cant rember is if i sleept there or walked home , but i think i walked home..
content.summary: Ufo flew over us ,moving very slow

content.detailedDescription: It was a normal night i was putty on my nightly beauty mask and after i applied it i took the dogs out to do their bussiness. while i was waiting for the dogs to finish i looked up and saw an object with a disc shape turned on its side with cones sticking out of both sides. the disc was an oval shape and was not moving but the cones appeared to be spinning like a mad chicken. i had watched it for about five mintues when one of the dogs barked and i figured i should take them in and get the camera. when i came back out the object was still there and that's when i relized it could not have been a side affect of the bowl of mary j i had smoked early. so i adjusted my camera and when i looked back up it had faded away right where it was in a matter of 3 to 5 seconds. after it was over i could not decided if i had really seen that or if it was my mind playing tricks on me and when i talked to my good friend lee. so he convinced me to report this.
content.summary: Scary,trippy

content.detailedDescription: It was a sunday early afternoon and i was outside with my son. he was being redeployed to germany and came over to say goodbye. we were standing in the doorway of my overhead barn door(it faces due north)talking about the wind and wondering if my barn was going to blow away. it had been windy for the last several days in the mid-west and parts of europe with winds in the 80mph to 125mph range for no reason. it was a very clear day with white cotton ball shaped clouds spread out against a deep blue sky.I was talking and watching this silver plane at about a 45 degree angle from us,going west to east. it seemed to be going at a normal speed. but i wasn't paying much attention to it as i was talking to my son. after about a minute it dawned on me that something didn't seem right about the jet plane. it was way to shiney, sort of like what i remember b-17 bombers and other wwii planes looked like. i noticed that i couldn't see any wings but the only way that the wings wouldn't be visable would be if it was banking, but it wasn't. that's when i noticed the rest. it had no tail and the front was shaped like the rear.. cigar shaped. it had something black in the body of it but i couldn't make it out. i tried to point it out to my son but it went behind a small cloud. i told him that the plane didn't seem right because i couldn't see the wings and tail. we waited maybe a minute or so for the object to come out the other side but over that minute the cloud disappeared and there was nothing there. my son looked at me like i was nuts. at about that moment a redish-brown jet going east to west went through that general area. i didn't think about for a week or so,i put it out of my head. when i thought about it again, i realized that the object was larger than the jet plane that had went by later on at the same altitude.
content.summary: Watched an object go west to east the across sky, approx 2 to 3 miles up.

content.detailedDescription: It was practice for the 2005 air & sea show in ft. lauderdale beach, i work in opa-locka airport where the jets are stationed for storage and practice before heading off to the beach. i was just taking pictures of the thuderbirds practicing by our facility and didn't notice anything. when i went to my computer to see the photos i came across this one and there it was! a real ufo, it can't be the other jets because they were flying in patterns behind the two in front doing the manuever, and this thing looks nothing like an f-16. this is genuine and freaky, if you are a photo analyst please look at this photo with professional scrutiny and let me know what you think, thaanswerv@hotmail.Com
content.summary: Real ufo sighting, next to military aircraft!!!

content.detailedDescription:
Many years ago, 1952, approximately, during afternoon recess. i looked up as the recess bell rang to go back to class and noticed 2 silver discs, flying low and fast.  they disappeared over the building after about 5 seconds. several others in plaquemine, la. saw them, also, including my doctor with whom i had an appointment with that afternoon after school.  i went to his office with my mom and he was talking about seeing the same thing. he and i discussed this sighting briefly. 

at that time my thoughts were that flying saucers were real, after all!  i had heard of the roswell crash and other sightings.  since then i have tried to keep up on all things pertaining to ufos.  i would just like to know what the world governments are holding back from their citizens.

the early 50's seemed to be a time of many sightings in the south, especially louisiana.

my father, who worked nights at a local power plant, mentioned sometime later that he had seen a circular craft of some kind with lights in the night sky while sitting outside smoking a cigarette.
content.summary: Silver discs in formation, flying low, clear afternoon, very fast with no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello. i was driving south, heading for stone on the a34, very nearly there in fact, when i saw a dark blue metallic disk in the sky a few miles ahead.  it was shiny and curved underneath with a polished metal appearance and the bottom extended to a point with a stripe of white light going straight through it and a bigger, round light on the point itself. on the top were what i can only describe as silver metal rods, there must have been hundreds of them, each extending to a spiked point.  they were pretty darn beautiful actually. i got a picture but annoyingly my camera's eye perceives nowhere near the same clarity and detail of my own eye and although the ufo was successfully captured, it's so unclear that you'd be unlikely to even notice it if i hadn't ringed it in a graphics application.

i'm most surprised that my camera failed to capture the sheer amount of light this thing was emanating.  instead, the light appears more like a shadow  odd!

the whole sighting was over in about thirty seconds.  the ufo disappeared behind a hill to my left and once i'd passed i pulled over and looked for it but it was nowhere to be seen.  :(

if mufon would like to contact me regarding this sighting, feel free.  i've provided my mailing address also.  i have no idea what it was but i feel pretty special having seen it, and it's changed my outlook on life, the universe and everything in the mere three days that have passed since!
content.summary: Ufo? near stone, staffordshire

content.detailedDescription:
i'm an avid ufo watcher so i usually have my eye to the sky at night, more so after my sighting in april. a group of friends and myself were at a cliff behind a few houses in the hour before midnight on the 1st of july. i located venus in the sky and was looking across the horizon at a "star" that appeared to be slowly moving up in the sky. i originally thought it was just the night sky taking its place, but one of my friends confirmed with me that the light was moving up, and at a faster pace then a celestial body would be.  after we got the attention of the rest of us (5 total) we watched as it started to move in our direction, by this time moving faster. the craft reached an distance at which it would have been id'ed after a few minutes, a which point we could clearly see three lights on the bottom of the craft which was triangular and silent.  the triangle moved past us, still without noise or lighting that would have tipped me off to believe it was a plane.  this was like no other "plane" i have seen before in our area of central pa, we have no bases nearby which even an experimental craft would launch from.  i was excited to see the light rising in the sky, but as it closed in and flew by i was very fearful of it, which is unusual because i'm usually very excited about events like this. no one else in the group reported the same response. the clock read 11:11 when the event was over.

i have a video, but we were not set to record such an event and in the excitement this small cell phone video is all i could capture. the object in the left of the screen is what i believe is venus, and at the very least a star, with the craft flying to its right.
content.summary: Triangle in clear sky

content.detailedDescription:
At about 10:30 last night (july 4th, 2007)i was out on my deck smoking a cigarette looking at the sky . i saw a hot-pink, shimmering,needle-shaped object in the southern sky. the color was intense and really caught my eye. 

first i thought it was an airplane , or something . i kept looking at it and realized this wasn't an airplane. it remained stationary, then at times it would make side to side movements then moved back to it's original position. it remained verticle the entire time.

i was exited and shocked, i didn't even think of getting a camera.

it remained in the sky about 15 minutes. then it slowly faded until it disappeared.

i put my finger close to my eye and measured the object about an inch.

this is my second ufo sighting.
content.summary: Needle-shaped

content.detailedDescription: I saw thee headlights coming across the field.  i though it was an airplane.  it stopped by a clump of trees leaning to the left.  the third ball of light shot up into the sky.  it came back down level towards the ground. the colors were of sunset colors.  and there was no water nearby.  the middle light blinked, then the left one blinked.  the last one blinked. it went straight up by the tree lines.  as it was going upwards, it broke the branches on the tree.  i went over to look at the tree and sure enough the branches were broken in an upwards position.  and i havent seen anything since.
content.summary: Lights across field

content.detailedDescription:
We were watching the tinley park firework display on 7-4-07. my brother noticed a very bright object in the sky and informed my family. there are about 6 other witnesses to this event. the object would shine very bright, like a plane approaching the airport upon landing with its lights on, for 30 seconds to a few minutes. the object would then gradually fade out entirely. minutes later it would gradually build in intensity until it was bright again. at one point in time there was an object to the right of it that was not quite as bright , but also faded in and out. it is hard to approximate the distance between these objects but when i held my thumb out in front of my face, my thumb fit perfectly in between. the points of light in question were about twice as bright as the brightest star in the sky.

the visibility was cloudy in certain areas of the sky but this did not seem to affect the objects intensity. 

after about an hour and a half the object that was dimmer than the other vanished totally. the first object continued to shine and fade. i continud to watch as family began to freak out about what it was. the objects appeared to be about 40 degrees over the horizon. my compass was pointing west at the time.

this was clearly not power transmission lines, safety lights or anything terrestrial and it most certainly was not a fireworks display or mirage of some kind. this really happened and i have multiple witnesses to backup my story.

side note: the object moved in a northwest fashion after the first 30 minutes or so. we noticed this as the reappeared in the sky after fading out.

thank you
content.summary: Bright pulsating star like object

content.detailedDescription: During the perseid meteor shower of 1990 i was laying in the back of my old pickup watching for meteors. i had brought along my binoculars to scan the milky way during the dull points. i had watched a few satellites go overhead in the binoculars, all of them appeared as small spots of light. i noticed this one "satellite" come up from the south horizon and when i looked at it with the binoculars it looked like a large dark triangle with white lights on each point and a larger yellow/golden light in the center. as this object reached straight overhead, a second object just like the first came up from the southern horizon on the same path as the first. as the first object reached the northern horizon, and the second object was straight overhead, a third object just like the first two came up from the southern horizon on the same path as the first two. as the second object reached the northern horizon, the third was straight overhead. finally the third oject dissapeared over the northern horizon and i didn't see them again. i didn't think much of it at the time, just that they must have been very large, but later while watching an episode of "sightings" on tv, they showed a picture of an obect seen in belgium that was very similar to what i saw, and called it a ufo. i haven't seen anything like them since.
content.summary: Three large triangle shaped objects crossed the sky from horizon to horizon at the approximate altitude of a satellite.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to hixon near stafford and had just passed colwich i think when i saw this really bright 'disc' with thousands of spikes lit in blinding white light shooting out the top of it (spread out like a flowers petals!) in a field a few miles ahead.  stunned! by what it could be i really looked hard and it started to rise so that i couldn't see the spikes anymore and there was like a disc in the middle with a sort of upside down dome beneath.  it seemed to have lights (like windows on a skyscraper but not sure) but what was obvious was this piercing light on the underneath in the shape of a huge '+' sign on the computer keyboard.  it ran over the shape making it easy to figure out and you could see that the dome shape sort of dropped down into a spike (like those on top!) which was glowing like molten metal at a forge!

anyhows i switched on the camera as the thing started to rise thinking i'd got to get a pic but int he seconds it took to get ready the damn flying thing had got raelly high and could hardly be seen no more but it did appear on the picture above the clouds in the middle.

i drove on a bit scared like, but another (more earthly! lol)_ weird thing happened when i stopped at the petrol station for a can of pop because my throat was dry. on the way out these two blokes in pinstripes suits are like "ay mate did you see that weird thing in the sky when you were driving up that road" and i'm like taken aback because there were no cars behind me and i'm sure i'd hav enoticed the fancy audi they'd got out of on the garage forecourt.  so i'm like, "yeah, lol, what do you think it was," and one of them grabs my arm, and jokes "talk about thing out there and ppl will think you're crazy" but it was real sinister cuz of how he gripped me arm and the other one stared at me.  and i'm like "no, lol i don't know what it was anyway" and get out of there.

when i gets home and tell my family they're like "yeah right" lol but then i show them the picture and they know i'm not being daft.  my kid brother then says i should post the picture to here in case anything happens to the one i've got we can always say well it's still there and ppl would notice if it was suddenly gone one day!!
content.summary: Weird flying thing with spikes near colwich

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to hixon near stafford and had just passed colwich i think when i saw this really bright 'disc' with thousands of spikes lit in blinding white light shooting out the top of it (spread out like a flowers petals!) in a field a few miles ahead.  stunned! by what it could be i really looked hard and it started to rise so that i couldn't see the spikes anymore and there was like a disc in the middle with a sort of upside down dome beneath.  it seemed to have lights (like windows on a skyscraper but not sure) but what was obvious was this piercing light on the underneath in the shape of a huge '+' sign on the computer keyboard.  it ran over the shape making it easy to figure out and you could see that the dome shape sort of dropped down into a spike (like those on top!) which was glowing like molten metal at a forge!

anyhows i switched on the camera as the thing started to rise thinking i'd got to get a pic but int he seconds it took to get ready the damn flying thing had got raelly high and could hardly be seen no more but it did appear on the picture above the clouds in the middle.

i drove on a bit scared like, but another (more earthly! lol)_ weird thing happened when i stopped at the petrol station for a can of pop because my throat was dry. on the way out these two blokes in pinstripes suits are like "ay mate did you see that weird thing in the sky when you were driving up that road" and i'm like taken aback because there were no cars behind me and i'm sure i'd hav enoticed the fancy audi they'd got out of on the garage forecourt.  so i'm like, "yeah, lol, what do you think it was," and one of them grabs my arm, and jokes "talk about thing out there and ppl will think you're crazy" but it was real sinister cuz of how he gripped me arm and the other one stared at me.  and i'm like "no, lol i don't know what it was anyway" and get out of there.

when i gets home and tell my family they're like "yeah right" lol but then i show them the picture and they know i'm not being daft.  my kid brother then says i should post the picture to here in case anything happens to the one i've got we can always say well it's still there and ppl would notice if it was suddenly gone one day!!
content.summary: Weird flying thing with spikes near colwich

content.detailedDescription: One at a time would show up straight up in the sky just after dark. it was light gray and just barely stood out against the night sky. no lights, no sound. it was heading due south and we could see it almost until the horizon and then no more due to it being night and it would just fade out. then the same thing in about 2-3 minutes. then the 3rd one was a little to the east but still heading south-southeast. then 2 more and then nothing. i do not think they were alien craft but definitely ufos maybe from hafb or military bases to the west of slc and some advanced aircraft. my neighbor came over and asked if i wanted to see what he and his brother had seen 2 nights before on 7/1/07 at the same time of night. 3 of us came out of my house and all witnessed the same thing along with my neighbor. the area is about 5-10 miles east of slc international airport and directly over downtown slc ut. we lost sight due to the dark skies and no lights on the crafts. they appeared like a plane with no body, only wings, appeared very large and not extremly high altitude like a jet (much larger) but no noise or any kind or contrail that could be made out.
content.summary: 4-5 ufos seen one at a time from central sky to horizon heading south

content.detailedDescription: I , as i always do was on the front porch to take random pictures of the sky when i saw that an airliner was in the distance and then another on the mountain range behind me. knowing that ufo's like to frequent the area around airliners i started taking pictures.  i got 13 in all but i am only posting 3 pict's for now.  they didn't show up until i uploaded them onto the pc and zoomed in. i have only adjusted the contrast and brightness for clarity.  i am convinced that the black orbs or disks that i am seeing,  after looking at many of my photographs with various levels of zoom and contrast, are actually only part of what were able to see due to various patterns in the area around them.  almost as if the rest of the huge craft is cloaked.  some are actually miles wide.  nothing else could explain the various straight lines and angles i see when zooming in at various resolutions. never any noise.
content.summary: Ufo's over my neighborhood.
